name: Zombies
declaringWar: I cannot wait until ye grow even mightier. Therefore, prepare for war!
attacked: Corrupted villain! We will bring you into the ground!
defeated: Eruch has been destroyed. I weep for the future generations.
introduction: Guten tag. In the name of the great Eruch people, I bid you welcome.
tradeRequest: It would be in your best interest, to carefully consider this proposal.
uniques: 67% chance to earn 25 Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit from a conquered encampment
50% chance of capturing defeated Barbarian naval units and earning 25 Gold
[Melee] units gain the [Eat the Living] promotion
[Mounted] units gain the [Eat the Living] promotion
[Armor] units gain the [Eat the Living] promotion
[WaterMelee] units gain the [Eat the Living] promotion
[Scout] units gain the [Eat the Living] promotion

name: Greenleaf
declaringWar: You're disturbing us, prepare for war.
attacked: You've fallen into my trap. I'll bury you.
defeated: I congratulate you for your victory.
introduction: Welcome. I'm Clinton Alderdice, of Dalmace; the smartest military man in world history.
tradeRequest: Dalmace offers you this exceptional proposition.
uniques: All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.
+[20]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Friendly Land]
Culture cost of adopting new Policies reduced by [10]%
Food and Culture from Friendly City-States are increased by 50%

name: The Myconoids
declaringWar: You've behaved yourself very badly, you know it. Now it's payback time.
attacked: You've mistaken my passion for a weakness, you'll regret about this.
defeated: We were defeated, so this makes me your prisoner. I suppose there are worse fates.
introduction: I greet you, stranger! If you are as intelligent and tactful as you are attractive, we'll get along just fine.
tradeRequest: How would you like it if I propose this kind of exchange?
uniques: Receive a tech boost when scientific buildings/wonders are built in capital
Allied City-States provide Science equal to [25]% of what they produce for themselves

name: The Wraiths
declaringWar: By the grace of God, your days are numbered.
attacked: We shall never surrender.
defeated: You have triumphed over us. The day is yours.
introduction: We are pleased to meet you.
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in a trade agreement with Pulias?
uniques: Units pay only 1 movement point to embark and disembark

name: Snafu
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: You fiend! History shall remember this!

name: Youbou
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: And so the flower of Youbou falls to barbaric hands...

name: Stoner
declaringWar: I have to do this, for the sake of progress if nothing else. You must be opposed!
attacked: You can see how fruitless this will be for you... right?
defeated: May God grant me these last wishes - peace and prosperity for Stoner.

name: Salmon Arm
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: They will write songs of this.... pray that they shall be in your favor.

name: Old Entrance
declaringWar: War lingers in our hearts. Why carry on with a false peace?
attacked: You gormless radger! You'll dine on your own teeth before you set foot in Old Entrance
defeated: A lonely wind blows through the highlands today. A dirge for Old Entrance. Can you hear it?

name: Legal
declaringWar: I will enjoy hearing your last breath as you witness the destruction of your realm!
attacked: Why do we fight? Because the law demands it. Now, witness the power of the Legals!
defeated: What treachery has struck us? No, what evil?

name: Vulcan
declaringWar: You have revealed your purposes a bit too early, my friend...
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: A wrong calculation, on my part.

name: Mirror
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: I guess you weren't here for the syrup after all...

name: Bawlf
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Unacceptable!

name: Happyland
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: What a fine battle! Happyland is willing to serve you!

name: Climax
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!

name: Eyebrow
declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
attacked: Traitorous man! The Eyebrow peoples will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
defeated: Vile ruler, know that you 'won' this war in name only!

name: Drinkwater
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: May the Heavens forgive you for inflicting this humiliation to our people.

name: Radville
declaringWar: After thorough deliberation, Radville finds itself at a crossroads. Prepare yourself, for war is upon us.
attacked: We will mobilize every means of resistance to stop this transgression against our nation!
defeated: The principles for which we have fought will survive longer than any nation you could ever build.

name: Forget
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: I have failed. May you, at least, know compassion towards our people.

name: Fertile
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: So this is how it feels to die...

name: Flin Flon
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We were too weak to protect ourselves...

name: Emo
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: The day of judgement has come to us. But rest assured, the same will go for you!

name: Pain Court
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Today, the Pain Court people obey you, but do not think this is over...

name: Punkeydoodles Corner
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Ah, Gods! Why have you forsaken us?

name: Tiny
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Perhaps now we will find peace in death...

name: Utopia
declaringWar: In responding to the unstinting malignancy that has heretofore defined your relationship with Utopia, we can have no recourse but war!
attacked: As we can reach no peaceful resolution with you, Utopia must turn, with reluctance, to war.
defeated: I regret not defending my country to the last, although it was not of use.

name: Purpleville
declaringWar: Do you really think you can walk over us so easily? I will not let it happen. Not to Purpleville - not to my people!
attacked: We are no strangers to war. You have strayed from the right path, and now we will correct it.
defeated: You are nothing but a glorified barbarian. Cruel, and ruthless.

name: Pontypool
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Congratulations, conquerer. This tribe serves you now.
